website_summaries.verdict: Chock-full of natural ingredients you can feel good about using.
pros: Made with all natural ingredients and infused with helpful oils to soften and hydrate your lips
Easy to apply, sits well on top of most lip colors
Has a subtle, pleasant fruity scent
cons: Not everyone is a fan of the tube-style lip gloss

customer_reviews.title: Best lip balm/gloss around!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my Goodness--I love this stuff! I've never had a lip gloss, balm that made my lips actually feel moisturized and not waxy. The Burt's Bees lip shines are the best around. Have a great texture, not too waxy, not overly colored/opaque, they feel light and not at all like lipstick. They even test great--not that you should eat them. I own these in five different colors and love all of them equally. I even went so far as to have work/desk tubes, purse tubes, and vanity tubes. I can't get enough. If you find my review helpful, please indicate so by using the voting buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Lioness

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloss
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to totally rave about, but a very nice gloss with a sanitary application method. Plenty shiny. On the thin side, so it doesn't stay put or last quite as well as thicker glosses, but it's more balmy than sticky, which is nice. Fruity smell/taste. I don't love that but I don't really mind it either, because I'm assuming the aroma/flavor is from a natural source, not a chemical one. The pale pink shade I got is pretty. I was worried it would be too cool of a pink and would clash with my warm complexion, but it's a very sheer milky pink that reads almost clear, and would probably be universally flattering. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: MWTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Color doesn’t show too well
customer_reviews.text: Love this lipgloss it does a great job looking glossy however I waited awhile to give my full review my concerns with it are is that I don’t get enough color i choose pucker which is a pinky tone and I have to layer it on for it to give me color or else it looks like a clear and once it gets slightly empty it starts spewing out the top also the product disappears after a short amount of time
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Color, Nice Feel
customer_reviews.text: I love this color (Smooch - very sheer cool redish, berry, plum) and find myself reaching for it quite often - even more so than some of my expensive department store brands of gloss and lip balms. I am very prone to chapped lips, and this one seems to be the perfect combination of moisturizing, color and gloss without being sticky or tacky.
customer_reviews.author: chellezu

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found it on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Can't find this product in the stores anymore. So glad I found it on Amazon. Me: light/medium skin tone, sensitive skin, and prefer minimal, natural looking makeup. I would describe taste and smell as fruity...apricot? Moisturizes and adds shine with a pretty good color payoff for a tube lip gloss. It's similar to Bath & Body Works Mentha Lip Tints, without the mint flavor of course. Only con, as with lip gloss in general, is you have to reapply often to keep the color.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and moisturizers
customer_reviews.text: I try to pick colors that are close to my lip color, so the shine doesn't look out of place. Luckily Burt's Bees has a wide variety of colors available, giving me a wide range of natural products to use. I alternate from the shine to the shimmer, and to the tinted lip balm. All staying with essentially the same color too. The shine is a soft and pucker type of product that I absolutely love. It gives my lips a nice shine, a pop of color, and it moisturizes as well. I highly recommend all the products I've mentioned above. UPDATE: I'm not a fan of the artificial watermelon flavor though, minus 1 star for that.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: My lips ended up more chapped than when I started using it!
customer_reviews.text: Given the company's emphasis on being "100% natural," I was expecting a good quality product. Unfortunately, I found the opposite to be true. The product goes on sticky and heavy. It wears off amazingly fast, and my lips end up even more chapped than they started out. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Island Livin'

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Lip Gloss for over 5 years!
customer_reviews.text: I love Burt's Bees lip gloss. I've been using this particular gloss for over 5 years and I haven't even bothered trying another kind in that time. It's extremely moisturizing, yet it's not goopy or sticky. (I'm an anti-sticky freak and have high requirements in that area. lol) It's easy to apply, ergonomically correct and you can easily control how much gloss comes from the tube. I've tried multiple colors and I like all of them really. Just the subtle touch to brighten up the face that a women needs without going overboard. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Api

customer_reviews.title: love love Burt's Bees Lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: love love Burt's Bees Lip gloss....keeps your lips moisturized as well....granted you have to reapply during the day....For someone who doesn't like the taste/smell of lip stick ...this product is awesome and it has a soft fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: A. Maroney

customer_reviews.title: Not too sticky
customer_reviews.text: I love this because it looks terrific on, and it is not too sticky! I hate sticky lip gloss! And as a bonus it is more "natural" than most, so I don't worry about licking my lips and getting chemicals in my mouth!
customer_reviews.author: KatieScarlettTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell and Super Shine - Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It has a slightly sweet fragrance but it is very subtle so you don’t really taste it like some other glosses. (I hate when I taste lip gloss!) I put this gloss over my Burt’s Bees regular lipstick and it brightens the look. I get tons of compliments! When I apply the gloss, I blot the excess on my fingertips and dab it on top of my blush for a bit of moisture on my cheeks. I’ve reordered this many times.
customer_reviews.author: Notmartha

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for rehydrateing chapped lips or a nice date night ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased multiple tubes of both 010 whisper and 030 wink. I truly can't go a day without using one of the two. It's perfect for rehydrateing chapped lips or a nice date night with the other half. I make sure I have a tube in every purse just so I have something for my lips on the go. I use alot of Burts bees products some deliver some dont for me (personally) but this product stays consistent. For real tho lol all my gfs and cousins use it also! Can't beat the price. Can't beat the product! !!!
customer_reviews.author: alecia p.

customer_reviews.title: Innovation: just another word for let me sell you half the product at twice the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Burt's Bees doesn't make it anymore. They now sell you less than half of this amount for nearly $3 more per item (they've also changed the format so you cannot buy it in this tube anymore).
customer_reviews.author: Snejana Balabanova

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love! Get this ASAP
customer_reviews.text: This lip gloss is super moisturizing, long lasting, and not sticky at all! The scent is nice and light and the color is not very noticeable. I also love that these are not overly shiny or greasy. I use this in the winter and the neutrogena lip shine with spf in summer!
customer_reviews.author: jade liborio

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much, I reordered it
customer_reviews.text: I had this color before and I was getting low on it and I absolutely love tye color so I ordered more. Its such a pretty color, it doesn't look as dark as it does in the picture so if you're looking for a dark red color this is more sheer with a dark red hint.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Williams

customer_reviews.title: "Smooch" is a purplish color
customer_reviews.text: "Smooch" is a purplish color. I would say that this Lip Shine color is more pigmented than the other colors they make. Most of the other colors look "colorless" for the most part. I didn't like this color at first, but I've gotten used to it. Once I use this tube up, I may try a different color, though. Overall, I do like the Burt's Bees Lip Shine product, as I find it very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Funnygirl2013

customer_reviews.title: My Lips Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Already use Burt Bee's lipstick. Wanted something to pop the gloss. The combination is dynamite. I am living in New Hampshire with cold and snow. My lips have really suffered, but one application of the lipstick and gloss makes everything better. I won't use any other lip products from now on! Economical, good colors and most of all, wonderful protection.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A. Siegfried

customer_reviews.title: Rich, smooth, but not sticky
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff.... so much so, that I've been buying it on Amazon because Target doesn't have my color. It's not sticky, but has a really rich, smooth feel (and look). It's moisturizing, looks beautiful, and is high quality. It's my current favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wreisner

customer_reviews.title: Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: One my absolute favorite lip glosses! I'm super picky about my lip gloss and hate when it feels tacky and drys out my lips. Never the case with this one. It goes on nicely and is moisturizing and lasting...plus the scent is lovely. I always get Blush and Pucker with Pucker being my favorite. I love how natural but still visible the color is on my lips and skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps shipping in plastic and summer heat isn’t a good idea
customer_reviews.text: I normally love Burt’s Bees products but I wasn’t happy with this But that may be because it had been in the heat before arriving to me - it has a nasty chemical smell ... this isn’t my opinion about all other products though.
customer_reviews.author: Love from Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: I am lucky to have good color in my lips, and I don't like to wear a lot of color on mine. This lip gloss is very light, almost clear, with a touch of sparkle and a thickness that keeps it on your lips for awhile. It has the scent of candy which I enjoy too. I just bought 3 more so I can have one at work, in my purse and in my car. I can't say enough about this lip gloss. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Hated this gloss. Smell wasn't good, too expensive just for one, was sticky and not long lasting at all. It starts to lool like this saliva white paste on your mouth after like 30 minutes. Instead buy the Broadway lipglosses they are much better quality and not as expensive especially for five glosses.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Nicely pale
customer_reviews.text: I like this tube of gloss. Just the right shade for me and goes on nicely. I have dry mouth so I can't testify to longevity but it seems to stay on very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color is good.  It feels sticky
customer_reviews.text: Color is good. It feels sticky though. Not sure if that is normal for this brand because this was my first Burt's Bees lip product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S

customer_reviews.title: Held up Well in the Heat!
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid that given our hot weather, my lipsticks would be melted. Not so. And I see the quality in them; colors will last a long time...just like any brand new cosmetic item.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Best lip gloss out there!
customer_reviews.text: I love Burt’s Bees lip gloss, it’s the only lip shine I use. It’s affordable and the colors are beautiful. The gloss applies beautifully and isn’t sticky! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't feel sticky like some other f Glosses. Doesn't go on thick. You can put it on with one coat and it's comfortable. Last a bit but not for hours.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiDV

customer_reviews.title: Please bring it back to the brick and mortar stores!
customer_reviews.text: They stopped carrying this lipgloss in store. I've been using this shade for the past 7 years. Love the color and texture. Doesn't last long on the lip but lipgloss rarely does. If they ever discontinue it, I'm not above hoarding.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Sickeningly sweet
customer_reviews.text: Very strong apricot scent. Probably better for little kids who like very sweet scents. Not as moisturizing as the others Burt's Bees lip products but better than most glosses/shines.
customer_reviews.author: Cortez the Killer

customer_reviews.title: RANCID
customer_reviews.text: The lip shine that arrived was RANCID. I'm all for natural and like this brand for most part. But, it's not a first time when their product go rancid quickly.
customer_reviews.author: NVer

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t let the tube fool you, it comes out very light on your lips! But it’s very nice and makes your lips plump and attractive :) you do have to reapply it often so it’s not quite 5 star material
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: They provide good moisturizing for my lips but nothing color wise. They are also bit sticky. Wouldnt buy again.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Must
customer_reviews.text: My favorite lip gloss! A must have in my workd. Good lip feel and texture. I’ve been given several compliments wearing this, and time and time again recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Steele

customer_reviews.title: Tastes gross
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizer Works well and the color is really pretty, But the flavor and the smell are kind of gross
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is just starting to wear makeup. It is the perfect shade for her!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Lip Product bar none!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute go-to lip gloss and lip conditioner. This product stays on my lips, whether over a matte lipstick, or just applied naturally for a softer look. I have every shade and I never run out. Its a crucial makeup kit need.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Herrin

customer_reviews.title: My fave
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They look so pretty on. They last and make my lips feel nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jay_me33

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this due to the price and the natural ingredients. It has a sheer color and feels great on the lips!
customer_reviews.author: Nurseandmommy

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty good! Love this for winter and it’s highly moisturizing
customer_reviews.author: CreativeCoco

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizing & shine, no flavor or scent
customer_reviews.text: No flavor, no scent & no animal testing; bit pricey for the item but Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Red pet

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful natural lip gloss!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip gloss tint! One of my favorites for sure. I like Burt's Bees brand and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: It smells like cat pee. No joke, I put it on & immediately could smell it and wanted to throw up. I don’t know if it’s fake, expired, or what, but it’s gross af please don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: hollllllly

customer_reviews.title: Very shiny, wet looking lips
customer_reviews.text: Glassy,glossy lightly tinted product. Feels a bit sticky but works fine. It has a good flavor/scent to it. I feel it looks better on my thin lips than most lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: JCBayArea

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My favorite natural lip gloss. The shine isn’t bad and it smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Anmllvr234

customer_reviews.title: Loved how this moisturizes my lips and doesn't cause peeling
customer_reviews.text: Light and glossy-smell is not too strong. This does not provide color, its a gloss-wear it over your preferred lip color for some pop. Loved how this moisturizes my lips and doesn't cause peeling.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Melendez-Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Burt's Bees and this was a nice pale pink to wear every day
customer_reviews.author: Ivy R Rivello

customer_reviews.title: I loved this Moisturizing Lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: I loved this Moisturizing Lip gloss. It's my got to Lip gloss. It's perfect for a dressy occasion as well as casual everyday wear. I would definitely recommend this and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Great no lipstick lipstick
customer_reviews.text: Little bit of tint, little bit of shine. Long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: crow

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: This color isn't available in most stores. Love, love, love it.
customer_reviews.author: ROCHELLE

customer_reviews.title: It’s an okay gloss, color comes thru a bit heavier than some
customer_reviews.text: This was decent (on sale). Would not pay full price as some cheaper brands are a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Made my lips dry out
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. Left my lips extremely dry after each use.
customer_reviews.author: cristy

customer_reviews.title: Very good!!!
customer_reviews.text: very good! A little thicker but really moisturizing. Good color, not super bright but some. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Not moisturizing.
customer_reviews.text: Does not moisturize. It had to put lip balm on top of it. Feels weird and drying. Does smell nice, tho...
customer_reviews.author: Giantgerman

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: It’s my go to lipgloss now ever since Victoria Secret changed their formula I’ve been looking for a replacement so this Burts Bees is fantastic, very moisturizing and has a nice sheer color. I’ve used Peachy and Blush and will be trying the other one too...
customer_reviews.author: Joyce R.

customer_reviews.title: Local stores no longer carry this
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have found this on Amazon! Dry skin on lips, chapped in hot summer, as well as cold winters in Alaska. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: DHoelscher

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: Lasts a long time, stays put without running outside of the mouth line, and smells amazing. The color is sheer but still gives the lips a nice tint. After using it, I bought three more tubes!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Job

customer_reviews.title: Nice shine, smell, and overall quality is great
customer_reviews.text: This gives my lips the perfect shine without the gummy sticky feeling I sometimes get with other gloss. The smell is nice tol
customer_reviews.author: Aryn Amber

customer_reviews.title: Lip service!  Sheer color, no bad stuff-
customer_reviews.text: Not sticky at a all and very moisturizing. I am sensitive and get lip irritation easily and no issues here. My only wish Is that it stayed on longer.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: A really nice lipgloss, smells good, doesn't have a taste, and lasts for a good amount of time .
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Ruth

customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't consider this very moisturizing but using it as a lip gloss, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but sticky
customer_reviews.text: Super cute gloss. Perfect color. The only problem is it’s super sticky and not very moisturizing. A bit disappointing from a company like Burt’s Bees.
customer_reviews.author: ElDa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. Color, taste, and texture. 10/10 will buy again and as gifts. Comparable if not better (gasp) than Victoria's Secret lip gloss. New to the Burt's Bees bandwagon, and now I see why people love the brand so much!
customer_reviews.author: Giggles

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Overall love adds a bit of color but just enough and it Moisturizes too!
customer_reviews.author: Daphnee

customer_reviews.title: Loveeee
customer_reviews.text: Loveddd it very cute and soft on lips. Its gentle on lips 💙
customer_reviews.author: Shauney ❤️

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this lipgloss although it is a bit sticky.
customer_reviews.author: RJSmileyFace

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stuff. A great healthy alternative to other lip glosses. It provides subtle color with a shiny gloss look.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Freye

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and shine
customer_reviews.text: I like how shiny and glossy this product is and the slight color. I can't always find this in the stores where I shop.
customer_reviews.author: Nanazon

customer_reviews.title: Product was stale
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th tube of Burt’s Bees gloss and upon opening it it’s tasted and felt stale- just too sticky and kind of gross smelling. There was no “use by” stamped on the tube where it should have been but I can tell it’s old. Bummer, it’s otherwise a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent/flavor/color (Wink) and it's cheaper than it is in stores. The only negative thing I have to say is that it didn't come in any packaging. It was just a loose item in the package, but still unopened/untampered. It has done well with keeping my lips moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: shayx3

customer_reviews.title: Great lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: Burt’s Bees is great! Goes on smooth, not loaded with a bunch of chemicals either.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Anne

customer_reviews.title: I love Burt's Bees lip shines because they aren't sticky & ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Burt's Bees lip shines because they aren't sticky & don't cake on if you re-apply a lot throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome. It really makes my lips pop
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. It really makes my lips pop.. I just wish they added Peppermint and Vitamin E Oil just as they do with the regular one.
customer_reviews.author: Raenita Washington

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for more of a sticky lip gloss and this one just feels kind of gross and after a few minutes of wearing it, it starts drying causing it to break down in little pieces of dry lip gloss on my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am MADLY in LOVE with this product!!! Will buy more when out! It smells great as well!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CalmRuby

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and Moisturized
customer_reviews.text: This is the only lip gloss I have ever used that moisturizers as well as lip balm while still giving me a glossy shine.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it !
customer_reviews.text: I love this all natural lip gloss and it smells so nice as well !
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn D.

customer_reviews.title: Smells like cat pee!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't tell you if this product is effective or not because as soon as I put it on I was overwhelmed by the smell of cat pee! It was so gross, it's all I could focus on. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: My most favorite lip gloss! Spring summer winter fall never have chapped lips!
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and natural
customer_reviews.text: Love how it feels, looks and that it’s all natural!
customer_reviews.author: Niamalika Parham

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tinted Chapstick/gloss
customer_reviews.text: I loved this colored lipgloss and keep it around daily to keep my lips moist and with a slight tint that is very pretty
customer_reviews.author: Atuggs

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful
customer_reviews.text: The shine is pretty but the smell is awful! STRONG and worse than a tropical fruit gum. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Whisper
customer_reviews.text: I like this lip gloss, it’s a bit sticky not too bad, SMELLS SO GOOD!! Not so moisturizing.. and didn’t last too long on my lips.. that’s just for me tho... I’m constantly drinking water and eating so I had to reapply it every time.
customer_reviews.author: Selena Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I like the color
customer_reviews.text: I like the color...even though its a little lighter than it looks. It goes on smoothly and feels nice on my lips. I do have to re-apply after awhile, but I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: C.S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this color! It just gives your lips the perfect tint.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Hollander

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite lipgloss moisturizers
customer_reviews.text: I love this gloss one of my favorite has a very slight tent a natural look keeps my lips moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Not the best lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would give a stronger color and moisture so I'm a bit disappointed. It does disappear after an hour or so
customer_reviews.author: Ghaida

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Burt Bees products! This lip gloss is shiny, natural and free of harmful ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: LJJ

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing in a great color
customer_reviews.text: Love this color! It’s very natural with a hint of pink. Keeps my lips moisturized and isn’t sticky.
customer_reviews.author: linda anderson

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it! Love the color and the fragrance. It doesn’t dry out and lasts without having to reapply often. I will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Siera cates

customer_reviews.title: Burt's bees lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: I love Burt's Bees products especially this lip gloss it does we are very well and it comes in many shades
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It’s not sticky, gives a super light pinkish tinted shine. Need one for all pockets in jackets and my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Nirode

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love this color. Natural way to add color to lips.
customer_reviews.author: C Lai

customer_reviews.title: Awesome all around
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this moisturizing lip gloss. I have been using this item for 4 years now and my lips never get cracked. They look plump and great.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Hardy

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I put it on after my lipstick and it keeps my lips moist all day
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I put it on after my lipstick and it keeps my lips moist all day
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product looks used!
customer_reviews.text: Product came in with seal around cap missing. It’s supposed to have a seal that breaks when you twist cap off (like one on a plastic water bottle). There is also something black inside cap and it looks like it has been used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always in my purse
customer_reviews.text: I think Ive bought this 100 times. It's my go to lip balm I carry every were.
customer_reviews.author: Tomasinia

customer_reviews.title: but in a very good way. Feels amazing on my lips for about ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a little darker than I thought it would be, but in a very good way. Feels amazing on my lips for about 30min then my lips r dry again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Like the color and taste /smell, but like many lip glosses the color tends to migrate to the margins of my lips. It's ok but wouldn't buy again. I prefer tinted balms.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyLVMT

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This stuff sucks. Makes your lips peel and isn't glossy at all, just sticky. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great gloss
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite lip gloss. Goes on smooth, I like the color and how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: bugandsmiles

product_meta.title: Burt's Bees 100% Natural Moisturizing Lip Shine, Whisper, 0.5 Ounce (1 Count)
product_meta.description: Color:Whisper| Size:0.5 Ounce (1 Count)Burt's Bees Lip Shine provides a natural sheer lip color with a super shiny finish. The lip gloss comes in one squeezable tube and is available in a range of 6 naturally stunning shades. The Whisper shade has a light pink hue with just the right amount of sheer neutral lip color and a sweet glossy shine to leave your lips naturally beautiful. This sheer lip gloss is enriched with moisturizing apricot wax to nourish and brighten your smile while the sunflower seed oil softens for healthy looking lips. The 100% natural lip tint has a smooth moisturizing glossy texture that looks great alone or over your favorite lipstick. Made with recyclable packaging, these lip glosses are free of parabens, phthalates, petrolatum and SLS. This natural beauty product has a versatile color palette featuring 6 available sweet shades from pink, to peach to mauve to flatter and nourish your lips naturally every day. Burt's Bees sheer color and sweet shine helps lips look healthy and natural.
feature_bullets: LIP SHINE: Add a hint of sheer, pink, lip color in a radiant Whisper hue with an irresistibly shiny finish
MOISTURIZING LIP COLOR: Enriched with moisturizing apricot wax and softening sunflower seed oil, this lip shine is the perfect smooth lip gloss you've been looking for
ALL NATURAL MAKEUP: Made with 100% natural ingredients, this lip color is formulated with natural oils to condition and hydrate lips all day long
SHEER COLOR: Use as a super shiny lip gloss on bare lips or for a fabulous layered effect, apply on top of Burt's Bees Lip Shimmers or Lipsticks
6 SHADES: Pucker up and find the perfect hue for your skin tone! Burt's Bees Lip Shine comes in 6 flattering shades ranging from pinks, nudes, reds and plums
